DOC.criteria: Fasting capillary blood glucose 127249 mg/dL screen BMI > = 18.5 kg/m^2 waist circumference > = 90 cm ( male ) > = 80 cm ( female ) Normal liver function Normal renal function OHAnaive typeIIdiabetic patient Symptomatic congestive heart failure , unstable angina pectoris , cardiac arrhythmia Uncontrolled hypertension History current treatment insulin Current treatment systemic corticosteroid herbal ( alternative ) medicine History renal and/or liver disease Pregnant breast feeding female
